item.title: Adding ::pickup to a 508
item.dc:creator: @lary370 lary370
item.description:
@lary370 wrote:

[quote=“NoobCoder, post:3, topic:333918”]nope nothin.
I’m using berky-scape source though if that helps any[/quote]
use this it should work

} else if (cmd[0].equals("item") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("lary370")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]));

change lary370 to your username

item.description:
@NoobCoder wrote:

} if (cmd[0].equals("pickup")) { Engine.playerItems.addItem(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1]), Integer.parseInt(cmd[2])); }
I compiled it then logged onto my server tried the command and nothing happened can someone help me please? =]
